choiceresponse.p: Which of the following statements are true?:
choiceresponse.label: Choose two or more answers:

checkboxgroup.choice: The ID given to XRANGE is the beginning of an inclusive range.
The ID given to XREAD is the beginning of an inclusive range.
The ID given to XRANGE is the beginning of an exclusive range
The ID given to XREAD is the beginning of an exclusive range

div.p: XRANGE uses an inclusive range, so will return messages including the one whose ID is specified, if it exists. XREAD returns messages whose IDs are greater than the one supplied, allowing clients to read new messages since the last time they accessed the stream.
